description: {"blocks":[{"key":"132ng","text":"Phage Screening - Colorimetric Test protocol involves a series of steps designed to detect the presence of specific bacteriophages through a colorimetric assay. This comprehensive procedure aims to provide a robust method for screening      and assessing bacteriophage activity within microbial cultures, essential for various research and diagnostic applications.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: Bacteriophage, detection, colorimetric assay, environmental surveillance
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"3q8ao","text":"1.     15ml Falcon tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"idhc","text":"2.     0.5% sodium hypochlorite ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9jr92","text":"3.     70% ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9r0nc","text":"4.     Cotton/Tissue paper","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bvkc","text":"5.     Gloves","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8l9cu","text":"6.     Tube holder","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eibfu","text":"7.     Discard bag","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50uli","text":"8.     Permanent marker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"osob","text":"9.     0.22μm syringe filter ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fgcc","text":"10.   5ml Syringe\n11.    LB broth ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7n7dt","text":"12.   Pipette sets","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2utqa","text":"13.   Sterile tips - 200μl 1000μl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6adlt","text":"14.   Disposable Serological Pipets, Sterile,  25 mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"elcfe","text":"To recover bacteria from stock open the tube and use a sterile loop, toothpick or pipette tip to scrap off some bacteria and streak on appropriate media plates using the overnight culture and grow at . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":199,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e6gt0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5aoe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcac2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eflha","text":"Inoculate   of fresh LB (1% inoculum) and grow at    until the cells reach a density of OD600=0.2. The amount of host culture to add is not critical, but it should be enough that would normally produce a saturated culture over the period of the enrichment (0.2 OD is enough or 0.5 McFarland Standard i.e. 1.5x 10^8 CFU/ml).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":90,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4atd4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bigfq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2f1gr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":28}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"31vn3","text":"If using lyophilized strain   ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e5mah","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"700F7AA7025D40729F07D777C69CCD5E","id":0,"step_guid":"25A3CEFA3A0F4FC6B8C3EAFD0BC1F13E","title":""},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"gotostep"}},"guid":"07000F1378A34675A6682A356551477A"}}}}
